message:
Integrate LLM-powered voice commentary system with backend

Frontend:
- Add voice analysis API client with polling and status checking
- Implement 5-second polling strategy (>10 char change threshold)
- Fix case-insensitive phrase highlighting
- Update to use backend triggers instead of hardcoded ones

Backend:
- Create stateful analyzer with comment pruning and density control
- Implement session registry server with PolyCLI integration
- Add Disco Elysium voice archetypes from scraped data
- Support multilingual sentence splitting (EN/CN punctuation + newlines)
- Match comment language to input text language
- Skip incomplete last sentences in analysis

Architecture:
- Backend maintains state across requests
- LLM only generates new comments (avoids repetition)
- Density rules: 1 voice per persona, 1 per sentence
- Comments automatically disappear when text deleted
